thread.title: 23 Ways To Clean & Organize Your Embarrassment Of A Car
thread.title_full: 23 Ways To Clean & Organize Your Embarrassment Of A Car

author: Emily Shwake
title: 23 Ways To Clean & Organize Your Embarrassment Of A Car
text:
The steering wheel feels like it’s 180 degrees because it probably is. ID: 10233586 20. Fill the gaps besides your seats with these neat Car Seat Catchers ($9). You will literally never lose your phone again and you have a spot to quickly stow your stuff. View this image ›
Amazon Just kidding, you can always lose your phone under the seat. Find this one at Amazon .
ID: 10234297 21. Keep your pooch safe in the back with this adjustable seatbelt harness ( $5.99 ). View this image ›
Amazon Get this one at Amazon .
ID: 10234427 22. For long drives, download SitOrSquat . It tells you where to find public restrooms along your route. View this image ›
Charmin Never consider the water bottle trick again. Ever. Get this one in the iTunes library. It’s fo’ fr .
ID: 10234439 23. If the cold is just too darn much for your car to handle, you can use a few household items to get out of a bind. View this image ›
Thinkstock You can use cooking spray to prevent your car doors from sealing shut and cover your windshield wipers with socks to keep them from freezing. A sock full of kitty litter also prevents frost. See the whole list here .
ID: 10245062
